info.description: You use the Calculation service for SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing in your sales channel application to determine the effective sales prices by applying promotional rules in the relevant customer context. The service can be called for a single product or for an entire shopping cart. The calculation is based on the data you uploaded to the cloud environment, and sends back prices and additional information about customer rewards to the calling application.
info.title: Calculation

x-sap-shortText: Calculate effective sales prices by applying promotional rules.

tags.name: Calculation
tags.description: Calculate effective sales prices by applying promotional rules.

post.description: Determines regular prices by applying promotional rules for the provided list of items.

parameters.name: tenantName
parameters.description: The name of the subdomain in which the service instance/subscription is created. **For the sandbox environment, enter 'oppsapihub'.**

400.description: The price could not be calculated. For more information, see the "Response" element of the "ARTSHeader" in the returned response.

default.description: This error is not related to the Calculation service.

requestBody.description: The transaction for which the price calculation is to be done

region.description: The SAP Cloud Platform regions in which this endpoint is offered

calculation_auth.description: To use this API, you need to obtain the OAuth client credentials (client ID and secret) using the SAP HANA Cloud Platform cockpit.

defaultError.title: Error
defaultError.description: The structure of this message depends on the error type.

ARTSCommonHeaderType.title: ARTS Header
ARTSCommonHeaderType.description: Contains basic information for the request or the response.

DateTime.title: Request Date and Request Time
DateTime.description: The date and time when the request was created. Although this is an array, only 1 entry is allowed.

Requestor.title: Requestor Identifier
Requestor.description: Identifies the agent which sent this message.

BusinessUnit.title: Business Unit
BusinessUnit.description: Business unit for which prices and promotions should be determined. Although this is an array, only 1 entry is allowed.

RequestedLanguage.title: Requested Language
RequestedLanguage.description: Uppercase ISO code of the language in which language-dependent texts like a promotion description should be returned. Uppercase representation. RequestedLanguage is not applied in conjunction with RequestedMultiLanguage. If not set, any language found will be used with Client API version 1.0. As of Client API version 2.0, use RequestedMultiLanguage instead.

RequestedMultiLanguage.title: Requested Languages
RequestedMultiLanguage.description: Uppercase ISO codes of the languages in which language dependent-texts like a promotion description should be returned. Not to be used in conjunction with RequestedLanguage. Requires at least API version 2.0. If not set, all languages found will be used.

MasterDataSourceSystemID.title: Master Data Source System Identifier
MasterDataSourceSystemID.description: Part of the compound key for items, item hierarchy nodes and business units. Each price record and each promotion refers to exactly one master data source system. Supported with Client API version 2.1 or higher. This field is required when using the cloud version of the price calculation.

ActionCode.title: Action Code
ActionCode.description: Describes what to do with the provided data.

MessageType.title: Message Type
MessageType.description: Defines whether this is a calculation request or a calculation response if the consumer only sends type "Request".

Amount.title: Amount Action
Amount.description: Action to be performed for a monetary amount.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

BusinessError.title: Business Message
BusinessError.description: Additional information for the consumer about issues during the price calculation.

ErrorID.title: Identifies the issue type.
ErrorID.description: Can be used for client side checks. For a complete list of possible error codes see the Troubleshooting section in the service guide for SAP Omnichannel Promotion Pricing under https://help.sap.com/viewer/ace37badc0774b4a8e540fdc7f56a802/Cloud/en-US.

Severity.title: Issue Severity
Severity.description: Issues with severity error or higher lead to an HTTP response code 400.

BusinessUnitCommonData.title: Business Unit
BusinessUnitCommonData.description: An entity for which prices or promotions are valid.

value.title: Business Unit Identifier
value.description: Identifies the business unit in combination with business unit type and master data source system identifier.

TypeCode.title: Business Unit Type Code
TypeCode.description: Specifies the type of a business unit. There may be several business units with the same identifier but different types. Default value is RetailStore.

CustomerOrderForDeliveryBase.title: Customer Order for Delivery
CustomerOrderForDeliveryBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers purchase an unavailable item. The store places a special order on behalf of this purchase, and the item is to be delivered as soon as available. The customer may, or may not pay for the item at the time of the order placement.

ItemID.title: Item contained in this Line Ltem
ItemID.description: Although this is an array, only 1 entry is supported.

MerchandiseHierarchy.title: Base Item Hierarchy Node
MerchandiseHierarchy.description: For information purposes only. The relevant list of hierarchy nodes is expected on the level of LineItemDomainSpecific.

Quantity.title: Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity of this line item. Although this is an array, only 1 entry is allowed.

RetailPriceModifier.title: Retail Price Modifiers
RetailPriceModifier.description: The list of modifiers of the sales price triggered by applied price derivation rules.

NonDiscountableFlag.title: Non Discountable Flag
NonDiscountableFlag.description: Specifies whether this line item may be discounted or not. If set to true, the line item may still be used as an eligibility for promotions. However, such an item does not contribute to fulfill the amount or quantity threshold that is needed for a promotion to become effective.

FixedPriceFlag.title: Fixed Price Flag
FixedPriceFlag.description: If set to true, the price calculation uses the provided value of RegularSalesUnitPrice as regular price and does not perform a price lookup for this line item.

NonPieceGoodFlag.title: Non Piece Goods Flag
NonPieceGoodFlag.description: Set this flag to true, if the specified quantity has a different dimension than "piece", for example, if fractional quantities are possible.

FrequentShopperPointsEligibilityFlag.title: Eligible for Receiving Loyalty Points
FrequentShopperPointsEligibilityFlag.description: Set this flag to true if the corresponding line item is eligible for receiving loyalty points.

PriceTypeCode.title: Price Type Code
PriceTypeCode.description: Reserved for future use. Value 00 corresponds to "regular price".

NotConsideredByPriceEngineFlag.title: Not Considered for Finding Promotions
NotConsideredByPriceEngineFlag.description: Determines if the price calculation should consider the line item as a trigger. This information is needed if another process (e.g. a return regarding to an existing transaction) applies rules for the line item that should not be applied. Assuming that the line item is discountable in general, the line item does not trigger a line-item-releated price derivation rule, get discount or get bonus points, if you set this flag to true. However, it can do so for a transaction-related price derivation rule.

FrequentShopperPointsModifier.title: Loyalty Points Modifiers
FrequentShopperPointsModifier.description: The list of modifiers for loyalty points determined by applied price rules.

PromotionPriceDerivationRuleReference.title: Price Derivation Rule References
PromotionPriceDerivationRuleReference.description: The list of promotions for which the corresponding line item contributed as an eligibility.

PromotionManualTrigger.title: Promotion Manual Trigger
PromotionManualTrigger.description: Manual triggers created by the client in order to make the transaction eligible for promotions that contain eligibilities of type manual trigger.

CustomerOrderForPickupBase.title: Customer Order For Pickup
CustomerOrderForPickupBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers purchase an unavailable item. The store places a special order on behalf of this purchase, and the customers pick up the item when available. The customer may, or may not pay for the item at the time of the order placement. CustomerOrderForPickup is currently not supported.

HeaderDateTime.title: Date and Time
HeaderDateTime.description: Defines the timestamp of the request or the response. It is not used as pricing date.

DateTimeCommonData.title: Date and Time
DateTimeCommonData.description: When used as pricing date, time zones are not considered.

Language.title: Language Code
Language.description: Provided in format ISO 639 as uppercase.

DiscountBase.title: Transaction Discount
DiscountBase.description: Generated during the price calculation as a separate line item.

PriceDerivationRule.title: Price Derivation Rules
PriceDerivationRule.description: Although this is an array, onyl exactly 1 entry is suppored

ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Number
ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for the trigger that allows more than one trigger to be assigned to a single RetailPriceModifier. It references the ManualTriggerSequenceNumber of PromotionManualTriggerType that triggered this price modifier.

ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.title: External System Originator Flag
ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.description: Determines if this discount was created by an external system. If yes, it must not be changed, but its own modifications with higher sequence may be applied. Default value is false.

SequenceNumber.title: Sequence Number of this Retail Price Modifier
SequenceNumber.description: Identifies this retail price modifier in the corresponding line item.

ItemLink.title: Item Link
ItemLink.description: The link to the discount line item that triggered the creation of this RetailPriceModifier in order to keep the prorated transaction-related discount for the current line item. Is not used in the context of the modification of the price of a single line item (item-related discount). Although this is an array, it contains at most one entry.

ProratedFlag.title: Discount Prorated
ProratedFlag.description: Specifies whether the discount amount applies to the whole transaction or is prorated to the discountable line items of the transaction. Currently always true.

ExtendedAmountType.title: Extended Amount
ExtendedAmountType.description: The total value of this line item, considering quantity and discounts.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

ExternalActionParameterType.title: External Action Parameter
ExternalActionParameterType.description: Specifies the value of an external action parameter if the applied price derivation rule has type "External Action".

value.title: Parameter Value
value.description: The value as stored in the promotion master data.

ID.title: Parameter Identifier
ID.description: Identifier as stored in the promotion master data.

ExternalActionTextType.title: External Action Text
ExternalActionTextType.description: Specifies the value of an external action text if the applied price derivation rule has type "External Action".

Language.title: Language Code
Language.description: Provided in format ISO 639 as uppercase.

ExternalActionType.title: External Action Rule Information
ExternalActionType.description: Contains all information specified by a price derivation rule of type "External Action".

FrequentShopperPointsModifierType.title: Loyalty Point Modifier
FrequentShopperPointsModifierType.description: Information about changes to loyalty points triggered by applied price rules.

PromotionID.title: Promotion Identifier
PromotionID.description: Identifies the promotion that triggered the loyalty reward. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value.

PointsAwarded.title: Awarded Points
PointsAwarded.description: The number of points awarded by the line item.

ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Number
ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for the trigger to be assigned to a single LoyaltyReward. It references the ManualTriggerSequenceNumber of PromotionManualTriggerType that triggered this reward.

ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.title: External Sytem Originator Flag
ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.description: Determines if this LoyaltyReward was created by an external system. If yes, it must not be changed, but its own modifications with higher sequence may be applied.

TypeCode.title: Reward Type Code.
TypeCode.description: Type code of the loyalty reward

SequenceNumber.title: Sequence Number
SequenceNumber.description: Identifies this loyalty points modifier in the current line item.

AppliedQuantity.title: Applied Quantity
AppliedQuantity.description: The line item quantity contributing to this modifier.

ItemLink.title: Item Link
ItemLink.description: Link to the LoyaltyReward line item that forced the creation of this FrequentShopperPointsPriceModifier in order to keep the share of the prorated transaction-related points for the current line item. It is not used in the context of modifying points for a dedicated line item.

IDCommonData.title: Identifier
IDCommonData.description: Meaning depends on the referencing field.

ItemID.title: Item identifier
ItemID.description: Identifes an item. Unique in combination with the master data source system identifier.

ItemLink.title: Item Link
ItemLink.description: Sequence number of a line item that contains a linked reward. Usually, a transaction discount that is prorated to the other line items. In this case, the line item with the transaction discount includes links to the line items that receive a prorated share of this discount. Vice versa, the receiving line items include an link to the discount line item from which they received a prorated discount.

LineItemDomainSpecific.title: Line Item
LineItemDomainSpecific.description: Depending on the type of the line item, one of the contained elements like Sales, SaleForDelivery must be filled.

SequenceNumber.title: Line Item Sequence Number
SequenceNumber.description: Identifies the line item. Although this is an array, exactly 1 entry is required.

items.title: Sequence Number
items.description: Sequence numbers of the line items of one ShoppingBasket must be sorted ascending starting with value 0 and have no gaps.

MerchandiseHierarchy.title: Item Hierarchy Nodes
MerchandiseHierarchy.description: This information is taken for checking eligibilities on item hierarchy level.

CustomerID.title: Customer Identifier
CustomerID.description: Identifies the customer of the loyalty account. Must be set, but currently the value is not used.

LoyaltyProgram.title: Loyalty Programs
LoyaltyProgram.description: List of loyalty programs to which this customer is assigned for this loyalty account.

CustomerIsEmployeeFlag.title: Customer is Employee
CustomerIsEmployeeFlag.description: Indicates if the specified customer is also an employee. Currently not used.

LoyaltyProgramID.title: Loyalty Program Identifiers for a Loyalty Account

LoyaltyProgramIDType.title: Loyalty Program Identifier
LoyaltyProgramIDType.description: Corresponds to a customer group identifer of a customer group eligibility.

LoyaltyRewardBase.title: Loyalty Reward
LoyaltyRewardBase.description: Loyalty reward on transaction level for the customercrediting. The crediting of a customer loyalty account with points is the only supported for reward type.

PromotionID.title: Promotion Identifier
PromotionID.description: Identifies the promotion that triggered the loyalty reward. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value.

PointsAwarded.title: Awarded Points
PointsAwarded.description: The number of points awarded by the line item.

ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Number
ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for the trigger to be assigned to a single LoyaltyReward. It references the ManualTriggerSequenceNumber of PromotionManualTriggerType that triggered this reward.

ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.title: External Sytem Originator Flag
ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.description: Determines if this LoyaltyReward was created by an external system. If yes, it must not be changed, but its own modifications with higher sequence may be applied.

TypeCode.title: Reward Type Code.
TypeCode.description: Type code of the loyalty reward

MerchandiseHierarchyCommonData.title: Item Hierachy Node Identifier
MerchandiseHierarchyCommonData.description: Unique in combination with the master data source system ID.

value.title: Hierarchy Node Identifier
value.description: Requires ID field to be unique.

ID.title: Hierarchy Identifier
ID.description: Several hierarchies may exist in parallel. In one request, at the most 2 different hierarchy identifiers can be specified.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

NewPrice.title: New Price
NewPrice.description: The price of the line item after the price derivation rule was applied.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

Percent.title: Applied Percentage
Percent.description: Percentage discount and the action how it was applied.

value.title: Percentage value
value.description: The value that is, for example, used for a percentage discount. It has to be a positive number.

Action.title: Action
Action.description: Specifies whether the percentage was added or subtracted.

PointsAwarded.title: Awarded Points
PointsAwarded.description: Specifies how many points were used by the price derivation rule.

Type.title: Award type
Type.description: Specifies whether the points were earned or something else.

PreviousPrice.title: Previous Price
PreviousPrice.description: The price of the line item before the price derivation rule was applied.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

PriceCalculate.title: Price Calculation Request
PriceCalculate.description: Request sent by the client. Contains all relevant information for the price calculation.

PriceCalculateBody.title: Price Calculation Body
PriceCalculateBody.description: Contains the items for which a price calculation should be performed and additional information about how it is performed.

InternalMajorVersion.title: Client API Major Version
InternalMajorVersion.description: Major version of the Client API version to be used. For Client API version X.Y, this field corresponds to the X part. Currently allowed versions of the Client API are 1.0, 2.0, 2.1. and 3.0. In a cloud environment, only version 2.1 or higher may be used.

InternalMinorVersion.title: Client API Minor Version
InternalMinorVersion.description: Minor version of the Client API version to be used. For Client API version X.Y, this field corresponds to the Y part.

PriceCalculateBase.title: Price Calculation
PriceCalculateBase.description: Contains relevant information for the price calculation like the items, date and time, and more.

TransactionType.title: Transaction Type
TransactionType.description: Indicates whether in this transaction items are sold or returned.

NetPriceFlag.title: Net Price Flag
NetPriceFlag.description: If set to true, the net regular prices are used for the price calculation. Otherwise, the gross prices are considered.

CalculationMode.title: Calculation Mode
CalculationMode.description: Controls if the items of the ShoppingBasket element are considered as part of a shared basket ("Basket") or if they are treated as separate items ("LineItem"). If not specified, "Basket" is used as default.

CalculationScheme.title: Calculation Scheme
CalculationScheme.description: Controls which price derivation rules are used for the price calculation. This is defined by the transaction control break code/price rule control code and the point in time for the application of price derivation rules (immediately or after subtotal).  For the calculation scheme type 'CalcAll', all transaction control break codes/price rule control codes can be applied (PC, PO, SP, SU). For the calculation scheme type "CalcForItem", only rules with transaction control break code/price rule control code PO and SP can be applied. If not specified, "CalcAll" is used as default. The calculation scheme is available as of version 4.0.

PriceCalculateResponse.title: Price Calculation Response
PriceCalculateResponse.description: Contains the response of the price calculation returned by the server.

PriceCalculateBody.title: Price Calculation Body
PriceCalculateBody.description: Contains the items for which a price calculation should be performed and additional information about how the it is performed.

InternalMajorVersion.title: Client API Major Version
InternalMajorVersion.description: The same value as contained in the request.

InternalMinorVersion.title: Client API Minor Version
InternalMinorVersion.description: The same value as contained in the request.

PriceDerivationRuleBase.title: Price Derivation Rule
PriceDerivationRuleBase.description: Contains information of an applied price derivation rule.

PriceDerivationRuleID.title: Price Derivation Rule Identifier
PriceDerivationRuleID.description: Identifies the price derivation rule. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value

Eligibility.title: Consumed Eligibilities
Eligibility.description: Only relevant for of coupon eligibilities. Each coupon that is used results in a separate eligibility element.

PromotionDescription.title: Promotion Description
PromotionDescription.description: Exists for compatibility reasons with earlier versions of the Client API (1.0). As of Client API 2.0, use PromotionDescriptionMultiLanguage instead of PromotionDescription.

PromotionDescriptionMultiLanguage.title: Promotion Descriptions
PromotionDescriptionMultiLanguage.description: Promotion descriptions in the languages requested by the client via RequestedMultiLanguage in the ARTSHeader. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher.

PromotionPriceDerivationRuleSequence.title: Sequence Value of the Price Derivation Rule
PromotionPriceDerivationRuleSequence.description: This is specified in the promotion master data and controls in which order rules are applied. Line-item-related price derivation rules and transaction-related price derivation rules are treated independently (all line-item-related promotions are applied first).

PromotionPriceDerivationRuleResolution.title: Resolution Value of the Price Derivation Rule
PromotionPriceDerivationRuleResolution.description: This is specified in the promotion master data and controls which rule is applied if several rules have the same sequence value. If there are price derivation rules with an identical sequence number and identical highest resolution, the service tries to perform a best-price calculation. It is not guaranteed that this will succeed.

PromotionPriceDerivationRuleTypeCode.title: Condition Type
PromotionPriceDerivationRuleTypeCode.description: Holds the condition type if this promotion discount should be mapped into an SAP ERP or SAP S/4 HANA condition record.

TransactionControlBreakCode.title: Line Item/Transaction
TransactionControlBreakCode.description: Indicates whether this is a line-item-related price derivation rule (PO/PC) or a transaction-related price derivation rule (SU/SP).

PromotionOriginatorTypeCode.title: Promotion Origin
PromotionOriginatorTypeCode.description: Contains information about the origin of the promotion as specifed in the promotion master data.

TriggerQuantity.title: Trigger Quantity
TriggerQuantity.description: The total quantity that needs to be purchased in order to trigger the price derivation rule.

DiscountMethodCode.title: Discount Method Code
DiscountMethodCode.description: Determines how the discount impacts the calculation of the transaction. Possible values are: 00 - The discount reduces the transaction total. 01 - The discount does not influence the transaction total or the amount that the customer has to pay. However, the customer gets a gift certificate for the discount amount that he can use to pay for the next purchase. 02 - The discount is used as a tender for the current transaction, for example it reduces the remaining amount that the customer has to pay. 03 - The discount reduces the transaction total but is counterbalanced by some gift certificate sale. 04 - A coupon is given to the customer instead of a discount. Transaction total is not reduced.

FrequentShopperPointsFlag.title: Loyalty Points Flag
FrequentShopperPointsFlag.description: Determines whether a discount (false) or loyalty points (true) are granted by the price derivation rule

ProhibitPrintFlag.title: Prohibit Print Flag
ProhibitPrintFlag.description: Determines if the result of the applied price derivation rule is to be suppressed on displays and accordingly not printed on the receipt. If this element is missing in the request, the default value is set to false and the applied price derivation is printed on the receipt.

TenderTypeCode.title: Tender Type Code
TenderTypeCode.description: Type code of the tender. This value is needed only for DiscountMethodCode = 02.

NoEffectOnSubsequentPriceDerivationRules.title: No Effect on Subsequent Price Derivation Rules
NoEffectOnSubsequentPriceDerivationRules.description: Determines whether applying this price derivation rule influences the calculation base of subsequent price derivation rules (false) or not (true). This is only relevant for line-item-related monetary price derivation rules.

ProhibitTransactionRelatedPriceDerivatio.title: Prohibit Transaction-Related Price Derviation Rules
ProhibitTransactionRelatedPriceDerivatio.description: Determines whether applying this price derivation rule influences the calculation base of subsequent transaction-related price derivation rules (false) or not (true). This is only relevant for line-item-related monetary price derivation rules.

ExclusiveFlag.title: Exclusive Flag
ExclusiveFlag.description: Determines whether this price derivation rule is an exclusive one. This impacts the application of further price derivation rules with a higher sequence.

AppliedCount.title: Applied Count
AppliedCount.description: Describes how often the current price derivation rule was applied.

ReceiptLine.title: Receipt Line
ReceiptLine.description: Exists for compatibility reasons with earlier versions of the Client API (1.0). As of Client API 2.0, use ReceiptLineMultiLanguage instead of ReceiptLine.

ReceiptLineMultiLanguage.title: Receipt Lines
ReceiptLineMultiLanguage.description: The texts to be printed on the receipt in the languages requested by the client via RequestedMultiLanguage in the ARTSHeader. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher.

ExternalPromotionID.title: External Promotion Identifier
ExternalPromotionID.description: Identifies an external promotion that was the origin for the corresponding OPP promotion.

ExternalPriceDerivationRuleID.title: External Price Derivation Rule Identifier.
ExternalPriceDerivationRuleID.description: Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value. Not used.

CouponPrintoutID.title: Granted Coupon Identifier
CouponPrintoutID.description: The coupon number of the printout coupon. Only relevant for DiscountMethodCode = 04.

CouponPrintoutRule.title: Coupon Printout Rule
CouponPrintoutRule.description: Describes how the printout of the coupon is to be done. Only relevant for DiscountMethodCode = 04. Possible values are: 00 - A separate receipt is to be printed. 01 - The coupon is to be printed at the end of the receipt of the current transaction.

CouponPrintoutText.title: Coupon Printout Text
CouponPrintoutText.description: The (formatted) text to be printed. Only relevant for DiscountMethodCode = 04.

PrintoutValidityPeriod.title: Coupon Validity in Days
PrintoutValidityPeriod.description: Describes for how many days the coupon will be valid. Only relevant for DiscountMethodCode = 04.

OperatorDisplayText.title: Operator Display Test
OperatorDisplayText.description: Texts shown to the operator in the languages requested by the client via RequestedMultiLanguage in the ARTSHeader. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher.

CustomerDisplayText.title: Customer Display Test
CustomerDisplayText.description: Texts shown to the customer in the languages requested by the client via RequestedMultiLanguage in the ARTSHeader. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher.

PromotionType.title: Promotion Type
PromotionType.description: Can be used to control further processing on client side. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher.

CalculationBaseSequence.title: Calculation Base Sequence
CalculationBaseSequence.description: The sequence value of the price derivation rule of which the result is taken as the basis for this price derivation rule. Only provided with Client API version 2.0 or higher. The type of this element is a string although its content has a numeric value. It could also contain a negative value. In that case the corresponding sign is reflected as a postfix. For example value  "-1" is reflected in this element by type string as follows: "1-".

ApplicationType.title: Application Type
ApplicationType.description: Describes the type of the applied price derivation rule.

PriceDerivationRuleEligibility.title: Eligibility
PriceDerivationRuleEligibility.description: Contains information about the consumed eligibility if this was a coupon eligibility.

ReferenceID.title: Reference Identifer
ReferenceID.description: Contains the coupon code for a coupon eligibility.

ReferenceSequenceNumber.title: Reference Sequence Number
ReferenceSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the line item containing the coupon for a coupon eligibility.

PromotionID.title: Promotion identifier
PromotionID.description: Identifies a promotion. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value

PromotionManualTriggerType.title: Promotion Manual Trigger
PromotionManualTriggerType.description: Information provided by the client for a manual promotion that is to be calculated. Contains eligibility relevant information and protentially also the specification of a discount (depending on the privilege type).

ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Number
ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.description: Identifies the manual trigger per line item. Must be a positive small integer.

ManualTriggerType.title: Manual Trigger Type
ManualTriggerType.description: Type of the manual trigger as defined in the promotion master data. This type is to be set by the client and used to determine relevant promotions.

ManualTriggerValue.title: Manual Trigger Value
ManualTriggerValue.description: Value for the manual trigger as defined in the promotion master data. This value is to be set by the client and used to determine relevant promotions.

PrivilegeType.title: Privilege Type
PrivilegeType.description: Specifies the type of the price adjustment. Valid values are: Absolute discount (RS), percentage discount (RP), new price (PS) or the reduction specified in the promotion master data (AM).

ManualTriggerSequenceAddend.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Addend
ManualTriggerSequenceAddend.description: A value that is to be added to the sequence of the promotion price derivation rule. This allows to apply multiple manual discounts with the same price derivation rule.

PromotionPriceDerivationRuleReferenceTyp.title: Price Derivation Rule Reference
PromotionPriceDerivationRuleReferenceTyp.description: Specifies the price derivation rule to which a line item contributed to.

PromotionID.title: Promotion Identifier. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value.

PriceDerivationRuleID.title: Price Derivation Rule Identifier
PriceDerivationRuleID.description: Identifies a price derivation rule. Decimal representation of a 64 bit integer value.

ReferenceQuantity.title: Reference Quantity
ReferenceQuantity.description: The quantity relevant for the applied price derivation rule.

value.title: Quantity Value
value.description: Must be an integer. The overall quantity is the product of value and units.

Units.title: Quantity Units
Units.description: May be fractional. Set this to one for piece like items. The overall quantity is the product of value and units.

UnitOfMeasureCode.title: Unit of Measure Code
UnitOfMeasureCode.description: Must match with the information specified in the promotions and regular prices. No conversion of unit of measures is done. Uppercase format.

Response.title: Response Fields
Response.description: Holds response specific information of an ARTSHeader.

RequestID.title: Request Identifier
RequestID.description: Identfier of the request to which this response relates.

ResponseTimestamp.title: Response Time Stamp
ResponseTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the request to which this response relates.

BusinessError.title: Business Errors
BusinessError.description: The list of business errors created during the processing of the corresponding request.

ResponseCode.title: Response Code
ResponseCode.description: Indicates if the message was successful (OK) or not (Rejected).

RetailPriceModifierDomainSpecific.title: Retail Price Modifier
RetailPriceModifierDomainSpecific.description: Contains information about the modification of a sales prices resulting from an applied promotion.

PriceDerivationRule.title: Price Derivation Rules
PriceDerivationRule.description: Although this is an array, onyl exactly 1 entry is suppored

ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.title: Manual Trigger Sequence Number
ManualTriggerSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for the trigger that allows more than one trigger to be assigned to a single RetailPriceModifier. It references the ManualTriggerSequenceNumber of PromotionManualTriggerType that triggered this price modifier.

ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.title: External System Originator Flag
ExternalSystemOriginatorFlag.description: Determines if this discount was created by an external system. If yes, it must not be changed, but its own modifications with higher sequence may be applied. Default value is false.

SequenceNumber.title: Sequence Number of this Retail Price Modifier
SequenceNumber.description: Identifies this retail price modifier in the corresponding line item.

ItemLink.title: Item Link
ItemLink.description: The link to the discount line item that triggered the creation of this RetailPriceModifier in order to keep the prorated transaction-related discount for the current line item. Is not used in the context of the modification of the price of a single line item (item-related discount). Although this is an array, it contains at most one entry.

ReturnBase.title: Return
ReturnBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers return an item that they brought at the same location. ReturnForDelivery is currently not supported.

ReturnForDeliveryBase.title: Return For Delivery
ReturnForDeliveryBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers return an item that is to be delivered to a location on a future date and time. ReturnForDelivery is currently not supported.

ReturnForPickupBase.title: Return For Pickup
ReturnForPickupBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers return an item and the store will pick it up from a location on a future date and time. ReturnForPickup is currently not supported.

RoundingCommonData.title: Rounding Information
RoundingCommonData.description: Contains information about the rounding of discounts.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

RoundingDirection.title: Rounding Direction
RoundingDirection.description: Describes whether the discount was rounded up or down.

RoundingRuleType.title: Regular Sales Price Rounding Rule
RoundingRuleType.description: Specifies how the regular sales price should be rounded after multiplying the unit price with the provided quantity.

RoundingMethod.title: Rounding Method
RoundingMethod.description: Specifies the rounding direction. Default value is Commercial.

Multiple.title: Rounding Result Multiple
Multiple.description: The rounding result must be an integer multiple of the specified value. Example: If the value to be rounded is 12.345, rounding method is Commercial and Multple is 0.05, then the rounding result is 12.35. Default value is 0.01.

SaleBase.title: Sale
SaleBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers purchase an item and takes it out directly. For a description of the properties see CustomerOrderForDeliveryBase.

SaleForDeliveryBase.title: Sale For Delivery
SaleForDeliveryBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers purchase an item that will be delivered to a location on a future date and time. SaleForDelivery is currently not supported.

SaleForPickupBase.title: Sale For Pickup
SaleForPickupBase.description: A flavor of a line item whereby customers purchase an item and pick it up from a location on a future date and time. SaleForPickup is currently not supported.

ShoppingBasketBase.title: Shopping Cart
ShoppingBasketBase.description: The collection of the line items to be processed.

LineItem.title: Line Items
LineItem.description: The response might contain more line items than the request due to generated transaction discounts.

PrimaryLabel.title: Coupon Code
PrimaryLabel.description: Must be unique within this request.

AppliedQuantity.title: Applied Quantity
AppliedQuantity.description: Quantity of items for which the provided coupons could be applied.

UnitPriceCommonData.title: Sales Price
UnitPriceCommonData.description: Depending on the usage, this might refer to one single unit or the total quantity of the line item.

Currency.title: Currency Code
Currency.description: Uppercase currency is expected in uppercase ISO format.

WorkstationIDCommonData.title: Workstation Identifier
WorkstationIDCommonData.description: Could be the identifier of a POS system.
